page.title: 07Mrs Edgar of Kirkstyle Farm
page.content: In the last 50 years Kirkpatrick Durham has changed a lot. The roads and pavements have improved and most houses have been improved because of a government grant for improving houses but not many houses have been built and the school has been shut down. A lot of new faces have moved in and the elderly are slowly disappearing. Before Mrs Edgar came to the village there were no toilets and no running water and people had to use the standpipe at the bottom of the village. The farm itself is getting far more modern and the number of employees is going down.
